title: KIIFB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Junior Engineering Consultant Post
description: Kerala Infrastructure Investment Fund Board (KIIFB) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Engineering Consultant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we provided more about the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the KIIFB Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible candidates ...
